rules_text:
{W}{U} JUDGMENT TAPOUT Cast judgment upon your foes with strong control effects.
{U}{B} ARBITRATE Move judgment and +1/+1 counters, and justice is yours to decide.
{B}{R} SPELLSLINGER Cast noncreature spells to boost your board presence.
{R}{G} STUDY Your creatures can research new spells or grow stronger.
{G}{W} SACRIFICE Your loss is no one’s gain. Sacrifice creatures and Treasures for profit. 
{W}{B} JUDGMENT CONTROL Wait patiently to pass judgment upon the enemy.
{B}{G} +1/+1 COUNTERS  Grow your creatures through study and engraving.
{G}{U} ARTIFACTS Build monuments and engrave your legacy with artifact spells.
{U}{R} SCULPTURES The living statuary of Akaddi is yours to command.
{R}{W} HARMONY Attack with both artifact and nonartifact creatures for bonuses.
